text: Youth in Revolt is a 2009 American comedy movie based on C.D. Payne's novel and directed by Miguel Arteta. It was released on January 8, 2010 at the Deauville American Film Festival in September 2009. The movie received positive reviews with a 69% rating on Rotten Tomatoes and a 63 out of 100 from Metacritic. == Cast == *Michael Cera as Nick Twisp/Fran√ßois Dillinger *Portia Doubleday as Sheeni Saunders *Jean Smart as Estelle Twisp *Mary Kay Place as Mrs. Saunders *Zach Galifianakis as Jerry *Justin Long as Paul Saunders *Ray Liotta as Lance Wescott *Steve Buscemi as George Twisp *M.
